para_sentences.para_0: At this point, you should be able to answer all of the following questions.
para_sentences.para_1: If you are unsure of any of these answers, take some time to review the course materials. Feel free to post questions into the General Q&A Discussion. Next week's lessons will be easier if you have invested in mastering this week's learning outcomes.
para_sentences.para_2: Check the Explorations and Task List in the Week 7 - Overview to review learning materials and make sure you have completed all required activities for this week.

ul_0: Implement Breadth-First Search (BFS) and Depth-First Search for a graph (DFS)?
How to analyze the time complexity of BFS  DFS?
How to apply graph traversal to implement graph-based algorithms?
How to implement graph traversal to solve problems?
What is topological sort and how to implement it?
What are the applications of the topological sort?
What is Dijkstra algorithm and how to implement it?
What are the applications of Dijkstra algorithm?
